title: Ripple would “welcome” an XRP ETF, CEO says
description:
Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse commented on prospects for an XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) in an interview with Bloomberg on Feb. 20. When asked whether Ripple would support an XRP ETF, Garlinghouse said: “We would certainly welcome it.” However, he did not describe any definite plans toward that end. When asked whether Ripple is currently in […]

The post Ripple would “welcome” an XRP ETF, CEO says appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Pro-Crypto Lawyer John Deaton Enters Senate Race to Challenge Elizabeth Warren
description: Cryptocurrency advocate John Deaton has formally announced his candidacy for the Senate in Massachusetts, setting his sights on unseating the current Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren from her position. “I’m excited for the opportunity to fight for change, and for the people of Massachusetts in the United States Senate,” Deaton wrote on Tuesday. title: Fantom Price Prediction 2024-2033: Will FTM Investors Waver in Crypto Winter?
description: Fantom Price Prediction 2024-2033 Fantom (FTM) was created to overcome Ethereum’s limitations and create a new generation of blockchain, solving the trilemma of scalability, security, and decentralization. title: LockBit’s ransomware operations disrupted by authorities
description: Law enforcement agencies worldwide, including the U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) and the U.K.’s National Crime Agency, recently cooperated in a major operation to disrupt the activities of the LockBit ransomware gang. Since its emergence in late 2019, the group has been a significant player in the global cybercrime landscape, targeting victims across various […]
